caption: MCP Server Configuration
description: Configuration for a public MCP server.
name: mcp_server_data

url.caption: Server URL
url.description: URL for the MCP server (used for remote servers).

command.caption: Command
command.description: Executable or runtime command (for local servers).

env_vars.caption: Required Environment Variables
env_vars.description: List of environment variables the user must provide (e.g., tokens, API keys).

headers.caption: Headers
headers.description: HTTP headers for the MCP server (non-sensitive).

tools.caption: Tools
tools.description: List of tools provided by the MCP server.

capabilities.caption: Capabilities
capabilities.description: Capabilities or features of the MCP server.

scope.caption: Scope
scope.description: Scope of the MCP server configuration (e.g., 'global', 'workspace').

author.caption: Author
author.description: Author or maintainer of the MCP server.
